snippet: The politically connected owner of a storied mansion-turned-wedding palace was shot in the head by a masked assailant Monday afternoon while getting into his car in the parking lot of his Long Island venue, Suffolk County police said....

headline.print_headline: Police: Owner of Posh LI Wedding Hall Shot
headline.main: Police: Owner of Posh LI Wedding Hall Shot

lead_paragraph: The politically connected owner of a storied mansion-turned-wedding palace was shot in the head by a masked assailant Monday afternoon while getting into his car in the parking lot of his Long Island venue, Suffolk County police said.
